revised_title: Amino and Carboxyl Group Titration in Amino Acids and Polypeptides
tldr: The authors describe the titration of amino- and carboxyl-groups in amino-acids, polypeptides, etc., focusing on estimations in the presence of formol and alcohol. They discuss the Sorensen and Foreman methods for estimating carboxyl groups and the effects of alcohol and formaldehyde on amino-acids. The study provides methods for the estimation of amino-acids in alcoholic and formaldehyde solutions.
